name: Frosmoth

passive.name: Hail
passive.effect: Deal 10 damage after your turn to Pokemon that aren't Ice type.

attacks.name: Quiver Dance
attacks.effect: Reveal the top 7 cards of your deck. Attach up to 3 Energies you find there to your Pokemon and discard the rest.

flavor: Frosmoth are rare moths that thrive in the wintery weather. Other bugs seem to hate the cold.
